div.data-code: DISTRICT STATEMENTS

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/zreDXMVN0vd3TAQPjkDy_-SUgvdHimZSPk93YQoimEn4s6tTs7yp5sa2uogUAqGXh6abNV7G=w16383);

div.data-code: VISION

p.em: To become the premier school district in Texas serving as the parent choice for educational excellence in academics, athletics, and the arts

div.data-code: MISSION

p.em: To create and connect stakeholders and dreams

div.data-code:
Bootstrap Example

PHILOSOPHY

p.em: Knippa Independent School District is a community united to create honest, proud, lifelong learners. As a team, Knippa board members, administration, staff, and community members are committed to maintaining a nurturing environment recognizing all students' abilities and teaching to their strengths and needs. Thus, Knippa Independent School District will enable its students to achieve their own goals and expectations, to have high self-esteem, and to become productive members of society

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-70SYQh0_wAE-vLEiEiVBLZPQwB1-ZtaYKTwdwJU8BgFxS9v0lM5TbGEcRnYQ-wQVP8GzcQO=w16383);
